## About Kleki

Kleki represents the versatile digital painting and illustration application that provides artists with powerful creative tools in an accessible interface across both macOS and Windows platforms. This sophisticated painting software combines the essential features professional artists need with an intuitive design that makes digital art creation approachable for beginners and experienced creators alike. The streamlined workflow combined with robust painting capabilities makes Kleki the preferred choice for digital artists, illustrators, concept artists, designers, and anyone wanting to express their creativity through digital painting and drawing.

The application's advanced painting engine includes pressure-sensitive brush support for graphics tablets, real-time brush preview for testing strokes before applying, and comprehensive color management with customizable swatches and palettes. Whether you're creating digital illustrations, character designs, concept art, comic artwork, or simply exploring creative expression through digital painting, Kleki delivers professional-grade tools with the accessibility needed for artists at all skill levels. The cross-platform compatibility ensures consistent painting experiences whether working on macOS systems or Windows computers, while the optimized performance provides smooth brush strokes and responsive tools even on complex artworks.

---

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended for large canvases and multiple layers)
- 300MB available storage space for application and project files
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- Graphics tablet recommended for pressure-sensitive drawing

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture recommended)
- 4GB RAM (8GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 300MB available storage space
- .NET Framework 4.8 or later
- Wacom or other graphics tablet support for enhanced drawing experience
